name: Evadere Hollow
description:
Inspired by iconic 2D action shoot-em-ups such as Luftrausers and Dead Cells, Evadere Hollow puts you in the shoes of Abel, an inspiring young wizard who finds himself in a vast and magical subterranean world known as the Hollow. Use your spells, outfits, and skills to survive the challenges of the Hollow, and prove to the world your magical talents, and pray you survive long enough to tell the tale! 

As Abel, you will have to fight your way through the Hollow, scavenging items from defeated monsters and harnessing their magic to increase your chances of survival. The Hollows are a perilous place, so ensure that you navigate the environment carefully, and use it to your advantage whenever possible!

Evadere Hollow provides a fun customisation system that allows you to tailor Abel's spells and equipment to your personal liking. Want to hit your foes hard so they don't get up? Soak up blow after mighty blow? Prefer to outrun your enemies? Just kit Abel out the way YOU want, so you can take on the Hollows the way YOU want!

Evadere Hollow provides a refreshing minimalist artstyle that can be enjoyed by all, combined with explosive action gameplay and an easy-to-learn, hard-to-master control experience that allows for endless playthroughs, it's impossible to find a boring moment while in the Hollows!

Strap in, pack your spellbook and get ready for Evadere Hollow, releasing to Itch.io December 14th, 2021!
